annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: For present law, see Chapters 10B and 10C of this title.

annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of authority pursuant to D.C. Law 7-226, the “D.C. Solid Waste Management & Multi-Material Recycling Act of 1988”, see Mayor’s Order 89-160, July 20, 1989.

Delegation of Authority Under the District of Columbia Solid Waste Management and Multi-Material Recycling Act of 1988 and the Litter Control Administration Act of 1985, see Mayor’s Order 2008-157, November 20, 2008 ( 55 DCR 12539).
